verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>placed<s%> <S%H2428>forces<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> his <S%H25>father<s%> had <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> of his <S%H25>father<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H1875>sought<s%> not to <S%H1168>Baalim;<s%>
But <S%H1875>sought<s%> to the Lord <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H25>father,<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and not after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>presents;<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

And his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H1361>lifted<s%> up in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5750>moreover<s%> he took <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places and <S%H842>groves<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Also in the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> even to <S%H1134>Benhail,<s%> and to <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> and to <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and to <S%H5417>Nethaneel,<s%> and to <S%H4322>Michaiah,<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And with them he sent <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> and <S%H6214>Asahel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jehonathan,<s%> and <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and <S%H2899>Tobadonijah,<s%> <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> and with them <S%H476>Elishama<s%> and <S%H3088>Jehoram,<s%> <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

And they <S%H3925>taught<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and had the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with them, and <S%H5437>went<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3925>taught<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> that were <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> so that they made <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat.<s%>

Also some of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>presents,<s%> and <S%H4853>tribute<s%> <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> he <S%H8495>goats.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H1980>waxed<s%> <S%H1432>great<s%> <S%H4605>exceedingly;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1003>castles,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4543>store.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> were in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H6486>numbers<s%> of them according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> Of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands;<s%> <S%H5734>Adnah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and with him <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>
And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him was <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> the <S%H8269>captain,<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> him was <S%H6007>Amasiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> who <S%H5068>willingly<s%> offered himself to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And of <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> <S%H450>Eliada<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and with him <S%H5401>armed<s%> men with <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And <S%H5921>next<s%> <S%H3027><s%> him was <S%H3075>Jehozabad,<s%> and with him an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> ready <S%H2502>prepared<s%> for the <S%H6635>war.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H8334>waited<s%> on the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
